ygData.subject: Re: Torn By Love

::KitKat::
She sighed and hugged Drillbit. She wanted to tell him about 
Destructor, but thought better of it. "I just wanted you to know that 
I have talked to Aracnia and she agrees, we will add Megatron to our 
council. But he will be taking all the risks. WE will let him fight 
the maximals and not use you or the others. I can't risk you or the 
other unless the risks are worth it. And right now, they aren't. "

She looked into his eyes and wished she had never fallen for him. Now 
she was torn in a three way tie between her pack, Drillbit and 
Destructor. And what made it worse, was she afraid for all three.

"I will meet with Megatron in two days and get things settled between 
us. Then, we will finish the war."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He was finally able to make it inside. Then KitKat's messages came 
over.
> He went to check on the guests, but they had already entered. He 
found
> KitKat. He had a big smile, as he came up and massaged her 
shoulders.
> "Hello love."
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> With the Mafia gone, he turned his fire on the base.
